resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Photograph, 'Chumba, Bridge on the Ravee from south', albumen print, Samuel Bourne, India, 1860s. Photograph shows a view of a bridge. There is a rocky bank protruding from the right and a hillside beyond the bridge.
